dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1: 7,000,000]. Imprint derived from the atlas in which this state of the map was issued. Previous state issued in the 1817 edition of"A New General Atlas"; engraver's name removed and number added. Numbered 46."Drawn and engraved for Thomson's New General Atlas." Shows boundaries, rivers, deserts, caravan routes and principal settlements. Relief shown by hachures and shading. Greenwich meridian.|Is Part Of: New general atlas ...|51 x 60 centimeters|Scale [1: 7,000,000]|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
